title: I want to start writing a fictional novel on teenage life, where do I start? I am really confused. - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you should start from describing the environment and the surrounding on which your novel is based upon. This can include the place (fictional or not), the main character friends, family and all the things which are going to be the part of your main character life initially.

Do you have a story/plot in mind? If not, then must make one. You need the whole sequence of events beforehand. If you are still confused on how to write, then try reading other books of the same genre. You might get a rough idea.
